You decide that it would be a good idea to leave the market for today. You excpet Rah's offer, and you two head to their home. You two leave the market without another sketchy encounter, and get home safely.

Once you get to Rah's house, they get out a river set and some seemingly random pieces of metal and wires.

"I found these radio parts in a dumpster!" they exclaim.

Rah holds out the old pieces of metal in their hands so you can see them better.

"So, wanna mess with these radio parts, or play a game of river or something?" they say, turning to you.
